Rodimus:

"Why this time? have you had an idea who is that person?"replied 
Rodimus, he didnt know why but he had a bad feeling about her



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> "My name is Fortuneteller, high priestess of the
> Gypsions.  I seek the one who brings light to the
> future.  I have seen his future on this world, and
> seen it spread across all worlds."  She knew she had
> to keep the back story straight for now, although she
> considered whether or not she should tell her full
> story to Organics in a cliche from an old human movie,
> before sucking her dry of Destiny energy.
> 
> The problem with that plan was there was no assurance
> she'd die from being drained, although it would
> probably leave her disoriented, or even insane.  Of
> course simply to be able to drain her Fortuneteller
> would already have to have disabled her to the point
> where killing her would be a simple matter.
> 
> She smiled at Rodimus, making sure it didn't appear to
> be an evil smile, that was what she would do.
>
